name: Compliment Clash
description: For generations, the Kingdom of Complimentaria has been the happiest place to ever exist. The citizens have achieved near perfect harmony with nature and live long happy lives. However, there are those within Complimentaria that oppose the kingdom’s joyful ways. To combat these forces, Master Kip has formed the Knights of Kindness to challenge these individuals to duels of words. Equipped with compassion, love, and positivity, the animals of the Knights will challenge these estranged citizens to a battle of words to help them begin to love themselves and their neighbors.
